channel.title: Help me! when i press runserver
channel.description: when i press runserver a black window just comes and goes out please help me what to do i have the newest jdk

item.title: Help me! when i press runserver
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

Right Click and edit RunServer, delete everything and replace with this:

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Hope I helped

Read full topic
item.source: Help me! when i press runserver
